item.title: The openESEA Modelling Language for Ethical, Social and Environmental Accounting: Technical Report
item.description: arXiv:2205.15279v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: Over the years ethical, social and environmental accounting (ESEA) has become a common practice among responsible organisations. ESEA entails assessing and reporting organisations" performance on environmental, social and governance topics. In this report, we present a textual grammar for specifying ESEA methods. With the grammar ESEA models can be created. Such models can be interpreted by our open-source, model-driven tool, called openESEA. The report presents the metamodel of the grammar, the grammar itself, and explanations of each grammar primitive.
item.dc:creator: Sergio Espa\~na, Vijanti Ramautar
